mapper.insert: INSERT INTO teams(teamname, koreanname, stadiumid, foundingyear, coach, city, introduction, leaguecategory, filename, filesize) VALUES(#{teamname}, #{koreanname}, #{stadiumid}, #{foundingyear}, #{coach}, #{city}, #{introduction}, #{leaguecategory}, #{filename}, #{filesize})
mapper.select: SELECT teamname, koreanname, stadiumid, foundingyear, coach, city, introduction, leaguecategory, filename, filesize FROM teams ORDER BY teamname
